title: Elementary Analysis: The Theory of Calculus (2e) - Kenneth A. Ro
description:
Elementary Analysis: The Theory of Calculus (Undergraduate Texts in Mathematics)
by Kenneth A. Ross

2nd edition 2013

A  study  of  this  book,  and  especially the exercises, should give the reader a thorough understanding of  a  few  basic  concepts  in  analysis  such  as  continuity,  convergence of  sequences  and  series  of  numbers,  and  convergence  of  sequences and   series of  functions.  An   ability  to read  and   write  proofs  will be stressed. A precise knowledge of deÃ¯Â¬ï¿½nitions is essential. The beginner should  memorize them;  such  memorization  will  help  lead  to understanding.
